thread.title: CHS Boys' Soccer: Wind once again a big factor as Green Wave top Pirates
thread.title_full: CHS Boys' Soccer: Wind once again a big factor as Green Wave top Pirates

author: Jim Turvey
title: CHS Boys' Soccer: Wind once again a big factor as Green Wave top Pirates
text: Follow @@CroxTimesSports Posted Oct. 15, 2015 at 6:05 PM The Pirates fell to the Green Wave 3-2 in the first round of the Section playoffs on Thursday. The Pirates went behind 3-0 in the first half, as EGF made the most of the wind blowing hard their direction. The Pirates got a goal (into the wind) at the end of the first half to cut the lead to 3-1, and came out fast in the second half. They got a second goal with 11:22 minutes to go, but couldn't grab a third to force overtime. Check back for a complete story with comments from head coach Don Cox and plenty of pictures.
